originContent: # Due to the holiday season and spending time with families, we will not be available to work on any additional requests until the end of January. During this time it will not be possible to raise new issues. #
translatedContent: # Due to the holiday season and spending time with families, we will not be available to work on any additional requests until the end of January. During this time it will not be possible to raise new issues. #

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ About Projectivy Icon Pack
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ About Projectivy Icon Pack

originContent: The **Projectivy Icon Pack** is designed specifically for use with the Projectivy Launcher application. Now with over 800 icons.
translatedContent: The **Projectivy Icon Pack** is designed specifically for use with the Projectivy Launcher application. Now with over 800 icons.

originContent: Created and based on the [Blueprint project](https://github.com/jahirfiquitiva/Blueprint)â€”which made the icon pack possibleâ€”itâ€™s easy to apply, with icons configured to automatically assign to all supported applications, saving you the time and effort of manually selecting icons for each app.
translatedContent: Created and based on the [Blueprint project](https://github.com/jahirfiquitiva/Blueprint)â€”which made the icon pack possibleâ€”itâ€™s easy to apply, with icons configured to automatically assign to all supported applications, saving you the time and effort of manually selecting icons for each app.

originContent: All icons are **custom-made** to deliver a modern and consistent look, with **transparent backgrounds** that enhance visual consistency and allow you to assign your preferred background colors in the launcher.
translatedContent: All icons are **custom-made** to deliver a modern and consistent look, with **transparent backgrounds** that enhance visual consistency and allow you to assign your preferred background colors in the launcher.

originContent: > **Tip:** For the best results, itâ€™s recommended to use a **dark background for icons**, as the icons are designed to look their best on darker backgrounds.
translatedContent: > **Tip:** For the best results, itâ€™s recommended to use a **dark background for icons**, as the icons are designed to look their best on darker backgrounds.

originContent: > **Note:** The Projectivy icon pack is designed and tested using Android / Google TV. If you are using a TV device that is running a mobile variant not designed for TVs, some icons may not auto-assign due to some applications using different activities for mobile operating systems. In this scenario, you may have to assign them manually.
translatedContent: > **Note:** The Projectivy icon pack is designed and tested using Android / Google TV. If you are using a TV device that is running a mobile variant not designed for TVs, some icons may not auto-assign due to some applications using different activities for mobile operating systems. In this scenario, you may have to assign them manually.

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ Sample Screenshot
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ Sample Screenshot

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ How to Download and set up
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ How to Download and set up

originContent: Download using **downloader code 9257057** or obtain the APK from [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/releases/latest).
translatedContent: Download using **downloader code 9257057** or obtain the APK from [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/releases/latest).

originContent: Once installed, assign the icon pack directly in the icon pack application by selecting the apply button, or in the Projectivy Launcher by following these steps:
translatedContent: Once installed, assign the icon pack directly in the icon pack application by selecting the apply button, or in the Projectivy Launcher by following these steps:

originContent: - From the launcher's menu, select **Projectivy Launcher Settings**.
translatedContent: - From the launcher's menu, select **Projectivy Launcher Settings**.

originContent: - Select **Appearance**.
translatedContent: - Select **Appearance**.

originContent: - Select **Cards**.
translatedContent: - Select **Cards**.

originContent: - Select **Icon Pack**.
translatedContent: - Select **Icon Pack**.

originContent: - Select **Projectivy Icon Pack**.
translatedContent: - Select **Projectivy Icon Pack**.

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ How to update the icon pack
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ How to update the icon pack

originContent: The easiest way to update the application is from within the in app updater. Once an update is released, you will see a prompt upon opening the application that a new version is available. You can still download the APK directly from GithHub or via Downloader if you prefer to do so.
translatedContent: The easiest way to update the application is from within the in app updater. Once an update is released, you will see a prompt upon opening the application that a new version is available. You can still download the APK directly from GithHub or via Downloader if you prefer to do so.

originContent: > **Note:** When a new version has been installed you will need to apply the icon pack again to see the changes.
translatedContent: > **Note:** When a new version has been installed you will need to apply the icon pack again to see the changes.

originContent: ## Changing Background Color for Icons
translatedContent: ## Changing Background Color for Icons

originContent: To further enhance the icon packâ€™s look, you can change the background color of the cards:
translatedContent: To further enhance the icon packâ€™s look, you can change the background color of the cards:

originContent: - From the Projectivy Launcher menu, select **Projectivy Launcher Settings**.
translatedContent: - From the Projectivy Launcher menu, select **Projectivy Launcher Settings**.

originContent: - Select **Appearance**.
translatedContent: - Select **Appearance**.

originContent: - Select **Cards**.
translatedContent: - Select **Cards**.

originContent: - Select **Background color**
translatedContent: - Select **Background color**

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ Requesting New Icons
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ Requesting New Icons

originContent: If you notice that an icon is missing for an application that is compatible with TV devices, you can submit a request for it to be added to the Projectivy Icon Pack [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/issues/new/choose).
translatedContent: If you notice that an icon is missing for an application that is compatible with TV devices, you can submit a request for it to be added to the Projectivy Icon Pack [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/issues/new/choose).

originContent: Before submitting a request, please check that the icon is not already included in the pack or has not already been requested. A full list of supported application icons can be found [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/blob/main/Icons/IconPackList.md).
translatedContent: Before submitting a request, please check that the icon is not already included in the pack or has not already been requested. A full list of supported application icons can be found [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/blob/main/Icons/IconPackList.md).

originContent: > **Note:** Whilst we aim to fulfil all requests, there is no guarantee that every request will be completed, and no specific timeframe can be provided for when requested icons may be added.
translatedContent: > **Note:** Whilst we aim to fulfil all requests, there is no guarantee that every request will be completed, and no specific timeframe can be provided for when requested icons may be added.

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ Automatic icon mapping issues.
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ Automatic icon mapping issues.

originContent: Whilst Iâ€™ve taken extra care to map and test each icon, there is always the possibility that something may have been missed. If you notice that any applications do not automatically have their icons assigned, first ensure that you are running the latest version of the application and have restarted your device. If the issue still persists, please raise a mapping issue [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/issues/new/choose).
translatedContent: Whilst Iâ€™ve taken extra care to map and test each icon, there is always the possibility that something may have been missed. If you notice that any applications do not automatically have their icons assigned, first ensure that you are running the latest version of the application and have restarted your device. If the issue still persists, please raise a mapping issue [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/issues/new/choose).

originContent: > **Note:** Mapping is only configured and tested on android/google tv devices. Devices running unofficial mobile variants wont be officially supported. It also may not be possible to automatically map every icon due to regional and device differences with app package names and activities. In these scenarios you can still apply the icons manually from within the launcher.
translatedContent: > **Note:** Mapping is only configured and tested on android/google tv devices. Devices running unofficial mobile variants wont be officially supported. It also may not be possible to automatically map every icon due to regional and device differences with app package names and activities. In these scenarios you can still apply the icons manually from within the launcher.

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ Requesting Icon Improvements
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ Requesting Icon Improvements

originContent: Not all icons are perfect, and sometimes a better design can enhance the overall look and feel of the app. If youâ€™ve discovered or created a design that you believe improves an existing icon, please create a ticket and attach an image of the proposed icon, ensuring that it is of high quality, clear, and sharp. You can submit an icon improvement request [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/issues/new/choose).
translatedContent: Not all icons are perfect, and sometimes a better design can enhance the overall look and feel of the app. If youâ€™ve discovered or created a design that you believe improves an existing icon, please create a ticket and attach an image of the proposed icon, ensuring that it is of high quality, clear, and sharp. You can submit an icon improvement request [**here**](https://github.com/SicMundus86/ProjectivyIconPack/issues/new/choose).

originContent: > **Note:** Icon improvement requests are considered a lower priority than requests for new icons. Not all improvement suggestions may be accepted, as they can be based on personal preference and may not actually be an improvement.
translatedContent: > **Note:** Icon improvement requests are considered a lower priority than requests for new icons. Not all improvement suggestions may be accepted, as they can be based on personal preference and may not actually be an improvement.

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ Troubleshooting
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ Troubleshooting

originContent: There are a couple of small squirks that are out of my control as its down to the launcher's behavior, but they are easy to work around and wont cause too much of an issue.
translatedContent: There are a couple of small quirks that are out of my control as it's down to the launcher's behavior, but they are easy to work around and wonâ€™t cause too much of an issue.

originContent: - ***"I have applied the icon pack for the first time and my old icons are still showing".***
translatedContent: - ***"I have applied the icon pack for the first time and my old icons are still showing".***

originContent: This will happen if you've manually assigned your own icons to each application. The icon pack won't override these so you will need to manually reset the icon for each application.
translatedContent: This will happen if you've manually assigned your own icons to each application. The icon pack won't override these so you will need to manually reset the icon for each application.

originContent: - ***"New icons added to the icon pack are not assigned to my apps".***
translatedContent: - ***"New icons added to the icon pack are not assigned to my apps".***

originContent: When updating the icon pack, new icons may not be visibly assigned to applications. You will need to apply the icon pack again following the steps in the "how to download and install" section of this document.
translatedContent: When updating the icon pack, new icons may not be visibly assigned to applications. You will need to apply the icon pack again following the steps in the "how to download and install" section of this document.

originContent: - ***"Updated icons are not showing. I still see the old revisions".***
translatedContent: - ***"Updated icons are not showing. I still see the old revisions".***

originContent: On occasion after updating the icon pack, the projectivy launcher cache may still show older icons of those icons that were replaced with improved versions. Restarting your device should solve this.
translatedContent: On occasion after updating the icon pack, the projectivy launcher cache may still show older icons of those icons that were replaced with improved versions. Restarting your device should solve this.

originContent: - ***"Icons against applications in the "all apps" menu have the incorrect icons next to them".***
translatedContent: - ***"Icons against applications in the "all apps" menu have the incorrect icons next to them".***

originContent: I feel this may be a bug with the launcher itself. After applying/updating the icon pack, on occasion the projectivy launcher cache may show the wrong icons against applications in the "all apps" menu. Restarting your device should solve this.
translatedContent: I feel this may be a bug with the launcher itself. After applying/updating the icon pack, on occasion the projectivy launcher cache may show the wrong icons against applications in the "all apps" menu. Restarting your device should solve this.

originContent: - ***"One of my apps just updated, and now the icon has reset and the app wonâ€™t open."***
translatedContent: - ***"One of my apps just updated, and now the icon has reset and the app wonâ€™t open."***

originContent: This happens because the app developer changed the apps  activity, so the icon is still mapped to an activity that no longer exists within the application. I've mentioned this to the projectivy dev, so hopefully it will be something that can be fixed in the launcher.
translatedContent: This happens because the app developer changed the app's activity, so the icon is still mapped to an activity that no longer exists within the application. I've mentioned this to the projectivy dev, so hopefully it will be something that can be fixed in the launcher.

originContent: ### To fix it:
translatedContent: ### To fix it:

originContent: 1. **Remove the app from your category**
translatedContent: 1. **Remove the app from your category**

originContent: â€“ Go into your category list and delete the app entry.
translatedContent: â€“ Go into your category list and delete the app entry.

originContent: 2. **Add it back again**
translatedContent: 2. **Add it back again**

originContent: â€“ The application should now open correctly.
translatedContent: â€“ The application should now open correctly.

originContent: â€“ You can manually reassign the icon if needed.
translatedContent: â€“ You can manually reassign the icon if needed.

originContent: 3. **Raise a mapping issue on GitHub**
translatedContent: 3. **Raise a mapping issue on GitHub**

originContent: â€“ Report the issue so the auto-mapping can be updated and restored in future releases.
translatedContent: â€“ Report the issue so the auto-mapping can be updated and restored in future releases.

originContent: ## ðŸ”´ Donating
translatedContent: ## ðŸ”´ Donating

originContent: [![Buy Me a Coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/custom_images/orange_img.png)](https://buymeacoffee.com/sicmundus)
translatedContent: [![Buy Me a Coffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/assets/img/custom_images/orange_img.png)](https://buymeacoffee.com/sicmundus)

originContent: The Projectivy Icon Pack will always remain free for everyone to enjoy. That said, creating custom icons and mapping them to the right app activities can be a little time-consuming. While donations are never expected, a small gesture is always appreciated for the time and effort that goes into keeping the pack fresh and updated.
translatedContent: The Projectivy Icon Pack will always remain free for everyone to enjoy. That said, creating custom icons and mapping them to the right app activities can be a little time-consuming. While donations are never expected, a small gesture is always appreciated for the time and effort that goes into keeping the pack fresh and updated.

originContent: Your support helps keep me motivated to continue adding new icons and fulfilling icon requests,so the pack can keep growing and improving for all users. If youâ€™d like to buy me a coffee, it would mean a lot, but just using and enjoying the icon pack is already awesome in itself.
translatedContent: Your support helps keep me motivated to continue adding new icons and fulfilling icon requests,so the pack can keep growing and improving for all users. If youâ€™d like to buy me a coffee, it would mean a lot, but just using and enjoying the icon pack is already awesome in itself.

originContent: > **Note:** I am not affiliated with the Projectivy Launcher. This is just one of my mini projects outside of my day-to-day work. I'm a happy user, and big thanks to the developer for providing such a great launcher!
translatedContent: > **Note:** I am not affiliated with the Projectivy Launcher. This is just one of my mini projects outside of my day-to-day work. I'm a happy user, and big thanks to the developer for providing such a great launcher!
